author: tv
msg: Added the missing dependency on concurrent, introduced by JCS

author: tv
msg: Maven 1.0 has only ant 1.6.5 available so a dependency on ant 1.7.0 must be added.

author: agilliland
msg: moving password utility class to weblogger.util package and removing old business utils package which is no longer needed.  this also removes the old DatabaseUpgrade class which was replaced by the DatabaseInstaller class.

author: agilliland
msg: make sure that if a theme has trouble reading a template file then we want to throw an exception and not include that theme in the library.

author: sebor
msg: * mman.h: Header with declarations of portability helper functions
for the manipulation of memory mapped files.
* mman.cpp: Definitions of the said helpers.
